'use strict';

module.exports = {
  attributes: require('./attributes'),
  layoutAttributes: require('./layout_attributes'),
  supplyDefaults: require('./defaults').supplyDefaults,
  crossTraceDefaults: require('./defaults').crossTraceDefaults,
  supplyLayoutDefaults: require('./layout_defaults'),
  calc: require('./calc'),
  crossTraceCalc: require('./cross_trace_calc'),
  plot: require('./plot'),
  style: require('./style').style,
  hoverPoints: require('./hover'),
  eventData: require('./event_data'),
  selectPoints: require('../bar/select'),
  moduleType: 'trace',
  name: 'waterfall',
  basePlotModule: require('../../plots/cartesian'),
  categories: ['bar-like', 'cartesian', 'svg', 'oriented', 'showLegend', 'zoomScale'],
  meta: {
    description: ['Draws waterfall trace which is useful graph to displays the', 'contribution of various elements (either positive or negative)', 'in a bar chart. The data visualized by the span of the bars is', 'set in `y` if `orientation` is set th *v* (the default) and the', 'labels are set in `x`.', 'By setting `orientation` to *h*, the roles are interchanged.'].join(' ')
  }
};
